a.span: Click here for the district continuous learning plan

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-align: center; letter-spacing: normal;

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;

span.br: We want you to know how PROUD we are of you and of the work you are doing during these times. All of us have messages today for you. Click on the link below and enjoy watching your teachers and WRV staff members. We miss you! We worry about you! Most of all, we want you to know how proud we are of you for continuing to be AMAZING as we work together through these difficult times! Whether we’re separated by distance and working online or just together in thought, WE ARE STILL THE WOLVERINE FAMILY!!

div.style: font-size: small; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;

span.div:
Mrs. Staggs, Mr. Walton, Mr. Lewis, and Dr. Hacker
https://youtu.be/tQ_1b7LVatA

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-align: center; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-align: center; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: Governor Holcomb has announced that all schools in Indiana are now closed through the end of the 2020-21 school year. Thank you for your support as we work through these unprecedented times. Hopefully, this will be our final adjustment to this schedule:

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: MONDAY-THURSDAY EXTENDED E-LEARNING PROGRAM—RESTART LUNCH GRAB/GO

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: FRIDAYS will be STUDENT CATCH—UP DAY with TEACHERS AVAILABLE 9-NOON

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: (If you are caught up, then Fridays are waiver days for you with no new assignments.)

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: Teachers will post assignments by 9AM and be available for students from 9-Noon each day Monday through Friday for questions via email or Google Classroom.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: (The one exception to this schedule is Friday, April 10th…which was a scheduled SNOW DAY; there will be nothing on that day). Our school offices are closed and staff is working from home under the Governor’s Stay-At-Home order. All administrators will be available through email.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: For those that need WIFI access: if you pull up close to the any of our schools, you can gain internet access. Students are to stay in their vehicles and maintain appropriate social distancing.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: The IHSAA has canceled the spring sports season. Our opponent is now this virus. Let’s all work together to help out those in need. Do what we can, but please adhere to Governor Holcomb’s directives.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: All new information will be available at the WRV district website at
, posted on the front doors of all WRVSD schools, and communicated through both Harmony email and School Messenger. Plans are in place for food service; please contact Mrs. Wiggington at
with any questions regarding grab and go or delivery.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
p.strong: We continue to work through this most fluid situation. Let’s continue to communicate together to help our students, our schools, and our community. We are Wolverine Tough!! We are all hurting! Stay tough together, and we will beat this challenge!!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;
text-align: center;

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

a.title: WRV School Board Approves Innovative Plans For The Future
